entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and it's mentioned that he's looking forward to getting back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend, and it's mentioned that Harry feels jealous of him when thinking about his welcome at the Dursleys' house.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry attends, and he's looking forward to getting back there.

entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is the Weasleys' home, where Harry has been staying for a month.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is the Dursleys' address, and it's mentioned that Ron will have to go back there next time he visits.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a member of the Weasleys' family, and she conjures up a sumptuous dinner for Harry's last evening at The Burrow.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are twins who round off the evening with a display of Filibuster fireworks.

relationships.description: Harry is looking forward to getting back to Hogwarts.
Ron will have to go back to Privet Drive next time he visits.
